Room.Name: Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the inner sanctum of the Wizard's Eye, and eligble to train.
Room.LongDescription: Only those who have passed the requirements may enter this magic room. Congratulations! You have been accepted to the next level, and are but a simple command away from it. You may train now. Before you leave, be sure to ask the sorceress to cast resistive spells on you.
